name: Tankz Alert - World of War
description:
Oldschool top-down shooter with arcade elements.
Take control of the soldier and shoot enemies with various weapons. Drive tanks and fly helicopters!
Game features:
• Fast-paced action: lots of units & bullets,
• Comfortable control scheme designed for this game from scratch,
• Become a soldier and shoot enemies with a pistol, shotgun, machine gun or bazooka,
• Take control of vehicles including tanks, helicopters, infantry fighting vehicles and off-road cars,
• Collect power-ups including first aid kits, ammo, short-duration invincible mode,
• Earn coins to upgrade your character (weapons power, hit points, speed, power-ups effect),
• 15 various missions and survival mode,
• Game is free to play.
